title: The Insurance story. - Rev. ed.
creator_credit: Cine Service, Geoffrey Thompson and Eric L. Morris
brief_description: The birth and development of general insurance, the basic principles involved in its operation and the vital protective role that insurance plays in modern industrial and community life. Shows the work of a typical insurance office and the procedure which follows from a client’s claim after a fire.
creator_credit_for_label: Cine Service, Geoffrey Thompson and Eric L. Morris
